select t.user_id,t.user_id userId, t.address,t.sex,t.user_id,t.user_id userId,t.level_cd,t.level_cd levelCd,t.location_cd,t.location_cd locationCd,t.score,t.name,t.tel,t.email,t.age from u_user t inner join s_store_user su on t.user_id = su.user_id and su.status_cd = '0' left join data_privilege_staff pu on t.user_id = pu.staff_id and pu.status_cd = '0' and pu.dp_id = #{dpId} where t.status_cd = '0' and pu.dp_id is null
and t.name like concat('%', #{staffName},'%')
and su.store_id = #{storeId} order by t.create_time desc
limit #{page}, #{row}
